create.title: Encrypt message
create.inputSecretPlaceholder: Message to encrypt locally in your browser

upload.title: Drop file to upload
upload.caption: File upload is designed for small files like ssh keys and certificates.

display.titleFetching: Fetching from Entrata Infosec database, please hold...
display.captionDecryptionKey: Do not refresh this window as secret might be restricted to one time download.
display.inputDecryptionKeyLabel: A decryption key is required, please enter it below

error.title: Secret does not exist
error.subtitle: It might be caused by any of these reasons.
error.subtitleOpenedBefore: A secret can be restricted to a single download. It might be lost because the sender clicked this link before you viewed it.
error.subtitleOpenedCompromised: The secret might have been compromised and read by someone else. You should contact the sender and request a new secret.
error.subtitleBrokenLink: The link must match perfectly in order for the decryption to work, it might be missing some magic digits.
error.subtitleExpired: No secret lasts forever. All stored secrets will expire and self destruct automatically. Lifetime varies from one hour up to one week.

result.title: Secret stored in Entrata Infosec database
result.subtitleDownloadOnce: Remember that secrets can only be retrieved once if not set otherwise. So do not open the link yourself.
result.subtitleChannel: The cautious should send the decryption key in a separate communication channel.

secret.subtitleMessage: This secret might not be viewable again, make sure to save it now!

delete.messageDeleted: The secret is removed from the server!
delete.dialogMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this Secret?

expiration.legend: The encrypted message will be deleted automatically after

features.title: Share Secrets Securely at Entrata
features.subtitle: The InfoSec team created this app to reduce the amount of clear text passwords stored in email and chat conversations by encrypting and generating a short lived link which can only be viewed once.
features.featureEndToEndText: Encryption and decryption is self hosted by the Entrata InfoSec team. The key is never stored after being shared internally.
features.featureSelfDestructionText: Encrypted messages have a fixed lifetime and will be deleted automatically after expiration.
features.featureOneTimeText: The encrypted message can only be downloaded once which reduces the risk of someone obtaining at your secrets.
features.featureSimpleSharingText: Entrata secrets sharing generates a unique one click link for the encrypted file or message. The decryption password can alternatively be sent separately.
features.featureNoAccountsText: Sharing should be quick and easy; No additional information except the encrypted secret is stored in the database temporarily.
features.featureOpenSourceText: This internal tool is designed for Entrata Engineering only. This will largely reduce  security risks.
